summary: This is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office (SDNY) personnel and an FBI Special Agent discussing case file requests related to Jeffrey Epstein. The FBI agent provides documentation of Epstein's phone number and last call, and the prosecutors discuss requesting the FBI's entire SENTRY file and all 302s to ensure they have all information.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: FBI Special Agent from the New York Field Office Violent Crimes Task Force who provided documentation of Jeffrey Epstein's phone number and last call made to the U.S. Attorney's Office.

events.title: Email exchange regarding Epstein case file
events.description: Email correspondence between SDNY prosecutors and an FBI Special Agent discussing requests for Epstein-related documents including the FBI's SENTRY file and 302s, with the FBI agent providing documentation of Epstein's phone number and last call.

keyFacts: The FBI Special Agent documented Jeffrey Epstein's phone number and last call made.
SDNY prosecutors discussed requesting the FBI's entire SENTRY file related to Epstein.
Prosecutors expressed uncertainty about whether they had previously requested all FBI 302s and considered making another request.
The email exchange occurred on July 14, 2020, showing ongoing investigation activities after Epstein's death.
